summary: The diff implements both REQ-1 (pink/crimson theme for toggles and buttons) and REQ-2 (Spotify music support) with reasonable coverage. REQ-1 is applied to TimerVisibilityBar and TasksPanel with new CSS variables and Tailwind tokens. REQ-2 is addressed in MusicSettings.tsx with updated placeholder/help text and Spotify icon. However, the diff does not include changes to musicSupport.ts (Spotify URL detection/conversion logic) or MusicStage.tsx (Spotify embed iframe rendering), which are explicitly required by REQ-2.

missing_requirements.requirement: In frontend/src/features/music/musicSupport.ts, add Spotify URL detection and conversion to embeddable Spotify iframe URLs (https://open.spotify.com/embed/).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include any changes to musicSupport.ts. There is no evidence of Spotify URL detection or conversion logic being added.

missing_requirements.requirement: In frontend/src/features/music/MusicStage.tsx, render a Spotify embed iframe when the music type is Spotify.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include any changes to MusicStage.tsx. There is no evidence of a Spotify embed iframe being rendered.
